**Cantilan Bank Profile:**

- Improved client access to financial services

**DOC-021: Agribank Case Study - Philippines Rural Bank**
- SOURCE_URL: https://oradian.com/case-studies/how-agribank-integrated-its-business-with-oradians-open-apis/

- CERTAINTY: High

**Agribank Profile:**
- Established 1978 in Nueva Vizcaya
- 21 branches, 12 branchlites
- One of top ten rural banking institutions in Philippines
- Serves unbanked/underbanked rural communities

**Leadership:**
- Dan (mentioned in case study)

**Partnership Journey:**
- Started digitalization in 2015
- Investigated several potential systems
- Chose Oradian when BSP allowed rural banks on cloud

**Key Decision Factor:**
- "Open API layer straight out of the box"

**DOC-022: Zurich Finance Corporation Case Study - Philippines**
- SOURCE_URL: https://oradian.com/case-studies/zurich-finance-corporation/
- CATEGORY: Customer Intelligence
- CERTAINTY: High

**ZFC Profile:**
- SEC-registered finance corporation
- Partners with Venture Motorcycle Sales Corporation
- Provides motorcycle financing in rural southern Luzon
- 12,000 clients
- Motorcycle loans, SME loans, salary loans, agriculture machinery loans

**Leadership:**
- Ronaldo Recto, Managing Director

**Challenge:**
- Reached limit of existing core banking platform
- Needed to continue growth
- Absence/unreliability of internet connectivity in rural areas

**Oradian Solution:**
- Field Officer App customized for credit investigators
- Offline capability for remote locations
- Risk assessments and asset photography offline
- Automatic upload when reconnected

**DRAMATIC Results:**
- Loan defaults reduced by 50%
- "Default rate went down by 50% because we were able to implement consistent loan policies"
- 320% growth in one year
- Open API integration with existing systems
